Checks MAF input to ensure column names are correct and renamed genes are corrected

Source: R/sanitize-data.R
sanitize_mutation_input.Rd

Checks MAF input to ensure column names are correct and renamed genes are corrected

Usage

sanitize_mutation_input(mutation, include_silent, ...)

Arguments

mutation

Raw maf dataframe containing alteration data

include_silent

Silent mutations will be removed if FALSE (default). Variant classification column is needed.

...

other arguments passed from create_gene_binary() (recode.aliases).

Value

a corrected maf file or an error if problems with maf

Examples

sanitize_mutation_input(mutation = gnomeR::mutations, include_silent = FALSE)
#> # A tibble: 725 × 29
#>    hugo_symbol entrez_gene_id uniqueSampleKey                   uniquePatientKey
